a.n: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun III (8)

p.k: Wayne and Des' charity hits its first birthday with a unique fun day. Jonny Hellraiser is a heavy metal guitar legend on the Costa Blanca, and he has bought himself a nest egg in the form of a 1950s-style diner. Business is hectic for wedding planner Louise, while auction boss Tony and old business partner Peter have gone their separate ways.
